Open Letter To Dmoz Org Free Directory

03 Jan 2010

Open letter,to DMOZ


Dear Gentelmen,

Page Rank and visibility on internet site is very important for company.Since yahoo & google shows DMOZ as a very
important director\n free and reliable, we wanted to register our website http://www.iris-it.com at your local directory.
\n
\n***************************************************************
\nWe tried to register as following:
\n
\n

In Italian


\n
\nCategoria:
\nAffari: Beni e Servizi per l’Industria: Automazione Industriale
\nor
\nAffari: Beni e Servizi per l’Industria: Lavorazioni: Costruzioni Meccaniche: Macchinari ed Attrezzature
\n
\nSite URL:

http://www.iris-it.com


\n
\nSite title:
\nIRIS srl
\n
\n

Site description in Italian:


\nLa IRIS srl si è contraddistinta negli anni per la produzione di impianti robotizzati di qualità in svariati settori industriali..
\n

Description of the Site in English:


\nThe IRIS Ltd. was marked in the years to produce quality robotic plants in various industrial sectors.
\n

Description of the Site in French:


\nLa IRIS S.r.l. a été marquée au cours des années pour la prodution d’installations robotisées de qualité dans divers secteurs industriels.
\n

Site Description in German:


\nDer IRIS Ltd wurde in den Jahren markiert zu produzieren Qualität roboterartige Pflanzen in verschiedenen industriellen Sektoren
\n

Description of the Site in Serbian / Croatian / Bosnian etz

– again the same language (only changes the name):
\nIRIS Doo Se prepoznaje sirom sveta, po robotizovanim linijama or kvalitet u razlicitim industrijskim sektorima.


\n****************************************************************

\nWe tried several times over the last two years to register our site, which until now by you has, neither been approved or refused. I do not understand why no one answers me at least why was not accepted.
\nSeveral times I have tried to contact your moderators to ask informations about my registration.
\nAfter my mails to moderators, I received several mails (not by moderators) where we were offered to register on DMOZ in compensation for money.
\n

\nFor this I am asking you two questions:
\n1. Why was not able to register our website?. Apparently everything was fine but our site (http://www.iris-it.com) does not appear.
\n2. From your website it appears that the registration is free,but different companies (which also present on your directory) offers registration on your directory in compensation for the money

If registration is with fee ,please tell me where should we do the payment (which moderator and/or company)?
\n
\nI extend my best regards
\n
\nThanks

Your Name
What You Are
you@example.com

github.com/yourusername
